Package freenet.io.comm

Interface Summary
AsyncMessageCallback Callback interface for async message sending.
AsyncMessageFilterCallback Sometimes it really is simpler to do things asynchronously.
ByteCounter Interface for something which counts bytes.
Dispatcher  
IncomingPacketFilter Filter interface used by Freenet to decrypt incoming UDP packets.
PacketSocketHandler Base class for UdpSocketHandler and any other datagram-based transports.
PeerContext  
PortForwardSensitiveSocketHandler  
SocketHandler Base class for all transports.

Exception Summary
DisconnectedException Thrown when the node is disconnected in the middle of (or at the beginning of) a waitFor().
IncomingPacketFilterException  
IncorrectTypeException Thrown if trying to set a field to a value of the wrong type
Message.FieldNotSetException  
NotConnectedException  
Peer.LocalAddressException  
PeerParseException Thown when we can't parse a string to a Peer.
PeerRestartedException Thrown if a peer is restarted during an attempt to send a throttled packet, wait for an incoming packet from a peer, etc.
ReferenceSignatureVerificationException Thown when we can't parse a string to a Peer.
RetrievalException
